short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on extension to activate 2048 cheat!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to spawn in 2048 tiles in the game "2048" hosted on "https://play2048.co/â€‹". Simply enter the amount of 2048 tiles you want (1-10) then press "Ok" , or chose to play the game regularly. To reset simply press the extension icon in the top right 
 to re-activate the cheat, refresh the page.
